monsterSpeed: Speed 30 ft., fly 60 ft., swim 30 ft.
monsterSavings: Saving Throws Dex +4, Con +3, Wis +2, Cha +3
monsterSpecials: Amphibious. The dragon can breathe air and water.
monsterActions: Bite. Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d10 + 2) piercing damage plus 2 (1d4) acid damage.

Acid Breath (Recharge 5-6). The dragon exhales acid in a 15-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a DC 11 Dexterity saving throw, taking 22 (Sd8) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
